author: ianna
body:
* If the Store holds raw pointers, make sure they are cleaned up
* Address the comments from @kpedro88 on the previous PRs: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24313, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24263, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24326
title: DD Store Cleanup
